Joe Simmons.Action: Kills a bound, gagged man without hesitation to fulfill his job and takes gold from the corpse.
Raises his gun without hesitation and efficiently executes the bloodied man with a single shot.
Carefully retrieves and takes four bars of gold taped to the dead man's back after the kill.
Transports the body to an industrial plant and disposes of it down an iron hatch in a methodical manner.
